item.value: p Note, that Framework7 ES modules are in ES-next syntax, so don't forget to enable/configure your Babel/Buble to transpile them as well, as well as template7, dom7 and ssr-window modules that used as dependencies.
In addition to default export it has named export for Template7, Dom7, Request, Device, Utils and Support libraries:
Install F7 Components
Import additional components
Framework7 can also be imported as an ES-next module:
From the downloaded Core package we will need files from css and js folders
starter app templates
It is recommended to use Kitchen Sink as a reference during development.
Framework7 Kitchen Sink is a great place to get started, it has a lot of examples for all Framework7 components and covers most of aspects.

Foo Bar
This is the base layout for your project, and will be used on every page unless specified.
Internal classes to show/hide elements in JavaScript
Make reset inherit font-family instead of settings sans-serif
Prevent text overflow on pre
Reset <button> styles created by most browsers
Styles Google Maps and MapQuest embeds properly
Make select elements are 100% width by default
Make sure textarea takes on height automatically
Grid defaults to get images and embeds to work properly
Get rid of gap under images by making them display: inline-block; by default
